item.title: Baked Bean Casserole
item.description: Ingredients ðŸ”— 1 Vidalia Onion 1 Red Bell Pepper 3 Garlic Cloves 1 lb Thick Cut Bacon 1 lb Ground Beef 1 Tbsp Cajun Seasoning 4x 15oz Cans Pork and Beans in Tomato Sauce(plain) 1/2 Cup Dark Molasses 2 Tbsp Light Brown Sugar 1/2 Cup BBQ Sauce 1 Tbsp Mustard Prep ðŸ”— Dice onion and bell pepper Mince garlic Cut bacon into 1" by 1/4" pieces Directions ðŸ”—Cook the bacon in a large pot.

item.title: Korean Steak Bulgogi
item.description: Marinade Ingredients ðŸ”— 1/2 cup Soy Sauce 1/2 cup Light Brown Sugar 1 Tbsp Sesame Oil 2 Tbsp Chili Garlic Sauce 1/4 cup Rice Wine Vinegar 2 Tbsp Minced Garlic 2 Tbsp Minced Ginger 1/4 cup Slice Shallots Bulgogi Ingredients ðŸ”— 2 lbs Top Sirloin or Rib-eye 1 1/2 Cups Jasmine Rice (1 cup per 3 people) 2 English Cucumbers 1 1/2 Cups Shredded Carrots Sesame Seeds to Top Sour Cream Sriracha 1 1/2 Tbsp Butter Salt Pepper 1 Tbsp Sugar 1/4 cup White Wine Vinegar Cooking oil Marinade Instructions ðŸ”—In a large bowl mix the soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, chili garlic sauce, rice wine vinegar, garlic, ginger and shallots.

item.title: Harbisons Sausage Bread
item.description: Ingredients ðŸ”— 1 Pkg. Bread(3 frozen loaves) 1lbs Grated Mozzarella Cheese 1lbs Grated Cheddar Cheese 1 Medium Can Parmesan Cheese 1 Large Jar Pimento Olives(chopped) 2 Cans Pitted Black Olives 1lbs Owens Sausage(loose hot) 1lbs Owens Smoked Sausage(sliced thin) 1 Stick Butter 6 Jalapeno Peppers(chopped â€“ no seeds) 12 Onion Tops(chopped) Directions ðŸ”—Divide loaves and ingredients into six parts. Butter loaves and place in pan to rise. Roll out dough long ways.

item.title: Bbq Chicken Pasta
item.description: Ingredients ðŸ”— 2 Â½ cups water 2 cups rotini pasta Â½ cup Sweet Baby Rayâ€™s BBQ sauce 2 green onions, chopped 1 cup red & green bell peppers, chopped Velveeta cheese Directions ðŸ”—Cook and stir chicken in large nonstick skillet on medium heat 8-10 minutes or until done. Remove from skillet; cover to keep warm. Add water to skillet; bring to boil, stirring occasionally to scrape brown bits from bottom of skillet.

item.title: Petes Ginger Cookies
item.description: Ingredients ðŸ”— 1 Cup â€“ Shortning 1 Cup â€“ Sugar 1 Egg 1 Cup â€“ Molasses 1 Tbsp â€“ Vinegar 5 Cups â€“ Flour 1 1/2 Tbsp â€“ Baking Soda 1 Tbsp â€“ Cloves 1 Tbsp â€“ Cinnamon 1 Tbsp â€“ Ginger 1/2 Tbsp â€“ Salt Directions ðŸ”—Cream shortening and sugar, add egg, molasses, and vinegar, beat well and dry ingredients. Stir well. Pinch a small ball then flaten in.
